conversation_history: uma:  So, villagers, any suspicions or insights from the events of last night? Bob's death must weigh heavily on us.
hannah:   It's crucial we work together to uncover the Werewolf lurking among us. Let's not waste any time in our quest for justice.
sam:   We can't afford to hesitate. Let's each share our suspicions and observations to catch the culprit.
nina:  Well, I had a vision last night, and it's clear to me that Oscar is not who he appears to be. My intuition tells me he may have hidden secrets.
hannah:   Nina, can you give us more details about what you saw in your vision that makes you suspect Oscar?
sam:  Nina, visions can be misleading. What did you exactly see that makes you suspect Oscar? Let's hear the whole story before we jump to conclusions.
hannah:  Nina, could you elaborate on the details of your vision to help us understand why you suspect Oscar specifically? Let's make sure we have all the information before taking action.
sam:  Hannah, we need concrete information. Nina, please share the specifics of your vision. What exactly did you see that makes you suspect Oscar? Let's get to the bottom of this.
sam:  Enough beating around the bush. Nina, tell us exactly what you saw that makes you suspect Oscar. We need the truth, not vague hints. Let's get to the heart of the matter.
sam:  Come on, Nina, we need concrete details. What exactly did you see that points to Oscar's guilt? We need clear information to make a decision. Let's not waste any more time.
uma:  Nina, could you share with us the specific details of your vision regarding Oscar? Let's ensure we have a clear understanding before we take any action.
sam:  Nina, the villagers need to know the specifics of your vision. Don't hold back now. Let's hear exactly why you suspect Oscar. The truth will set us free from this darkness.
hannah:  Nina, your reluctance to provide specific details raises more questions. We need transparency to weed out the real threat.
uma:  Sam, Hannah, do either of you have any suspicions or insights to share about the events of last night? Let's consider all perspectives before we make a decision.
hannah:  Let's not lose sight of the accusations made towards Oscar. Nina, we are still waiting for more concrete information to make an informed decision.
Uma has discovered that Oscar is a werewolf.
Nina has discovered that Sam is a werewolf.

I vote for Sam.
